00011   class PoissonModel: public EllipticModel {
00012   public:

00015     PoissonModel(Mesh* myMesh, 
00016          vector<DiffusionMaterial * > Materials, 
00017          const uint NodeDoF);
00018 
00020     ~PoissonModel() {
00021       set<DiffusionMaterial *> UNIQUEmaterials;
00022       for (uint i = 0; i < _materials.size(); i++) 
00023     UNIQUEmaterials.insert(_materials[i]);
00024     
00025       for (set<DiffusionMaterial *>::iterator it = UNIQUEmaterials.begin();
00026        it != UNIQUEmaterials.end(); it++) 
00027         delete (*it);
00028     };
00029 
00031     // From constant value
00032     void initializeField(const Real value = 0.0) {
00033       _field.assign(_field.size(), value);
00034     };
00035 
00037     void initializeField(const Real* value) {
00038       _field.assign(value, value+_field.size());
00039     };
00040 
00042     // From solution array
00043     void linearizedUpdate(const Real* localValues, Real fact=1.0) {
00044       const int nLocalDof = (_myMesh->getNumberOfNodes())*_nodeDoF;
00045       for(uint i = 0; i < nLocalDof; i++)
00046     _field[i] += localValues[i]*fact;
00047     };
00048 
00049     // One value at the time (Node ID, dof index, value)
00050     void linearizedUpdate(const int id, const int dof, const Real value) {
00051       // assert( id < _field.size() && dof == 0 );
00052       _field[id] += value;
00053     };
00054 
00055     void linearizedUpdate(const int dof, const Real value) {
00056       _field[dof] += value;
00057     };
00058 
00059     void setField(uint dof, Real value) {
00060       _field[dof] = value;
00061     };
00062 
00063     void setField(const Real* value) {
00064       _field.assign(value, value+_field.size());
00065     };
00066 
00067     void setPrevField() {
00068       _prevField = _field;
00069     };
00070 
00071     void getField(vector<double> & x) {
00072       assert(x.size() == _field.size());
00073       x = _field;
00074     }
00075 
00076     void printField() {
00077       for (uint i = 0; i < _field.size(); i++)
00078     cout << _field[i] << endl;
00079     };
00080 
00081     uint getNumMat() {
00082       set<DiffusionMaterial *> UNIQUEmaterials;
00083       for (uint i = 0; i < _materials.size(); i++) 
00084     UNIQUEmaterials.insert(_materials[i]);
00085     
00086       return UNIQUEmaterials.size();
00087     }

00091     void writeOutput(const string OutputFile, const string format);
